summary: This document consists of administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, including an official out-count sheet, an inmate roster with suicide watch assignments, and count slips. The forms detail inmate population counts by housing unit and specifically note several inmates assigned to suicide watch on August 9, 2019, the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death.

events.title: Inmates Placed on Suicide Watch
events.description: An inmate roster shows four inmates (REG NOs 0001, 0002, 0003, 0004) were assigned to "SUICIDE OR UNASSG" (suicide observation or unassigned) status.

events.title: Official Prison Out-Count
events.description: An official out-count was conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, detailing inmate population totals by housing unit (e.g., B-A, C-A, E-N, etc.).

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The documents are from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, where Jeffrey Epstein was held.
An inmate roster dated August 9, 2019, lists four inmates with assignments categorized as "SUICIDE OR UNASSG."
An official out-count sheet is dated August 10, 2019, detailing inmate population by housing unit.
The administrative forms are routine prison records for tracking inmate location and status.
The timing of these documents (August 9-10, 2019) coincides with the period immediately preceding Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
